description: Disassociates a list of client devices from a core device. After you disassociate a client device from a core device, the client device won't be able to use cloud discovery to retrieve the core device's connectivity information and certificates.

parameters.name: entries
parameters.description: The list of client devices to disassociate. (dict) --- Contains a request to disassociate a client device from a core device. The BatchDisassociateClientDeviceWithCoreDevice operation consumes a list of these requests. The name of the IoT thing that represents the client device to disassociate.

nested_params.name: thingName
nested_params.description: The name of the IoT thing that represents the client device to disassociate.

parameters.name: coreDeviceThingName
parameters.description: The name of the core device. This is also the name of the IoT thing.

nested_items.name: errorEntries
nested_items.description: The list of any errors for the entries in the request. Each error entry contains the name of the IoT thing that failed to disassociate.

nested_items.name: thingName
nested_items.description: The name of the IoT thing whose disassociate request failed.

nested_items.name: code
nested_items.description: The error code for the request.

nested_items.name: message
nested_items.description: A message that provides additional information about the error.
